answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hi Susan, 
To answer your question I found the Home Rule Charter for the City of Coppell, TX that discusses the use of warrants in sections 2.01 and 7.10. 
https://icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/5730
I hope you find this information useful and that others chime in with some first hand experience. 
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Susan Thorpe
text:
I am conducting research for the question of which agency supervises the peace officers that serve warrants for Municipal Court and those that serve as bailiffs.  
For your municipal court, is it your Court Administrator? Municipal Presiding Judge? Police Department/Chief?
I'm searching for best practices.  Thanks in advance for your help. 
Susan Thorpe, ACM Corpus Christi TX
title: Who is in charge of serving warrants for Municipal Court?
